channel.title: Modeling on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Modeling on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Software Modeling
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Agenda Why do we need Software Modeling What is Software Modeling How to do Software Modeling This is how I approach a new topic or knowledge, starts with why, understand the concept and figure out how to make it happen.

item.title: Finite State Machine
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A Finite State Machine is a model of computation based on a hypothetical machine made of one or more states. Only one single state of this machine can be active at the same time.
